content.title: RHBA-2024:6169: linux-firmware bug fix update (Important)
content.description:
The linux-firmware packages contain all of the firmware files that are required by various devices to operate.

Bug Fix(es):

* [Intel 9.5 FEAT] [SRF] QAT_402XX firmware update [rhel-9.4.z] (JIRA:RHEL-47356)
